entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 01:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -32.1°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.1°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
